name: Spotify AddToFavorites
description: Quickly favorite songs from the now playing view. Set a playlist as your favorite by long pressing on it to bring up the context menu while on the Library page, the same way you would pin a playlist. A heart icon will appear to the right of the playlist image and title.

Removed button from now playing bar

1.0.7: Hide favorite button while viewing songs context menu
